Docs.param: The .
The chat message to send.
The chat options to configure the request.

Optionally specifies whether to set a JSON schema on the . This improves reliability if the underlying model supports native structured output with a schema, but may cause an error if the model does not support it. If not specified, the underlying provider's default will be used.
